alert.note: Alert for Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 28 at 2:08AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Aransas, central Calhoun and eastern Refugio Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, or near Seadrift, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Seadrift, Port Oconnor, Alamo Beach, Indianola, Magnolia Beach, Aransas National Wildlife Refuge and Matagorda Island State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun Islands; Coastal Aransas; Coastal Calhoun; Coastal Refugio
